CustomField.description: Eyeota uses Standard Contractual Clauses to transfer data from/to Eyeota outside of the European Union, if data would be transferred to Eyeota under a different transfer mechanism, please indicate.
CustomField.label: Transfer mechanism outside EU

value.fullName: We will be transferring data to Eyeota using Standard Contractual Clauses
value.label: We will be transferring data to Eyeota using Standard Contractual Clauses
